text: Clarence Henry (March 27, 1926 â€“ February 28, 1999) was an American heavyweight boxer. Contender for Rocky Marciano's title. He was a leading boxer in the heavyweight division in the early to mid-1950s. Henry was 1948 Los Angeles Times Golden Gloves Heavyweight Champion. He was elected into the World Boxing Hall of Fame in 1998. ==Other websites== *Boxing record Category:American boxers Category:Sportspeople from San Antonio, Texas Category:1926 births Category:1999 deaths
title: Clarence Henry
